titleStmt.title: The summe of Doctor Leyburnes answere to a letter printed against him by M.r Blacloe
titleStmt.author: Leyburn, George, 1593-1677.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the widdowe of marke Wyon,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication conjectured by Wing.
At foot of title page: Superiorum permissu.
Thomas Blacloe is a pseudonym for Thomas White.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
